extension.author: www.CodeFire.in
extension.copyright: (C) 2005 - 2008 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
extension.description:
Allows blocking of countries based on the user's geoIP.
We have used MaxMind free geoIP DB if you want more accuracy you can use paid version of the DB.

field.name: country
field.label: Country Codes
field.description: Country Codes to be blocked for example US for United States. Use comma (,) seperated values for multiple countries

field.name: action
field.label: Allow or Deny
field.description: Allow only the listed Country Codes above and Deny all other (non matching) Codes, or Deny listed Country Codes and Allow all others

field.name: wblist
field.label: Whitelist/Blacklist
field.description: Whitelist or Blacklist IP (ranges) which are always allowed or denied

field.name: ipfile
field.label: List with IP adresses:
field.description: File containing array's with IP (ranges) for Whitelist/Blacklist

field.name: external
field.label: Verification
field.description: Do you want to install geopIP on your own site. If yes select Local else External(disabled). In case you use Local you will need to update geopIP DB everymonth.

field.name: show_msg
field.label: Message or Redirect
field.description: When a user from blocked country logs in display message or re-direct to other site

field.name: blockedText
field.label: Text Message
field.description: Text to be displayed is the user is from blocked country

field.name: site
field.label: Site
field.description: Site to redirect to, if the user is from blocked country. Enter as http://www.CodeFire.in
